title: Safety Management Policy
introduction: Queue Inc. (hereinafter referred to as "the Company"), as an enterprise operating the app and web service trading platform "APPEXIT," considers providing safe and secure services to customers as our top priority, and declares our commitment to building a comprehensive safety management system and continuously improving it.

basicPolicy.title: Basic Policy
basicPolicy.intro: The Company recognizes ensuring user safety as the most important management issue and establishes the following basic policies:
items: We will operate with the safety of users' lives, bodies, and property as our top priority
We will comply with laws, regulations, and industry standards related to safety
We will continuously conduct risk assessments and preventive measures
We will provide safety management education to all employees
We will establish a rapid response system for emergencies

section1.title: 1. Scope of Application
section1.intro: This policy applies to all business activities related to the APPEXIT service.

targetScope.title: Target Scope
items: Ensuring transaction safety on the platform
Protection of personal information and confidential information
Prevention of fraudulent transactions and fraud

targetPersons.title: Target Persons
items: All officers and employees of the Company
Business contractors, partner companies, and other related parties
All others involved in the Company's services

organizational.title: (1) Organizational Structure
items: Establishment and regular meetings of Safety Management Committee
Appointment of safety management officers in each department

cso.title: Chief Safety Officer (CSO)
cso.description: Overall supervision of safety management system, formulation and approval of safety management policies

committee.title: Safety Management Committee
committee.description: Deliberation of important matters related to safety, command of emergency response

departmentManager.title: Department Managers
departmentManager.description: Implementation and management of safety measures in departments under their jurisdiction

allEmployees.title: All Employees
allEmployees.description: Compliance with this policy and related regulations, practice of safety in daily work

verification.title: (1) Identity Verification and Screening
items: Implementation of strict identity verification procedures (KYC)
Eligibility screening of sellers and buyers
Verification of registration information for corporations

monitoring.title: (2) Transaction Monitoring
items: Implementation of fraudulent transaction detection systems
Reporting and investigation of suspicious transactions

escrow.title: (3) Physical Verification through Escrow Settlement
items: Escrow settlement conducted outside the platform
Dedicated staff contact both parties via email for physical verification
Code quality verification: Review of actual source code
Fund verification: Confirmation of buyer's payment capability
Handover only proceeds after all verifications are complete

prevention.title: (1) Preventive Measures
items: Detection and removal of false information

prohibition.title: (2) Clarification of Prohibited Matters
items: Prohibition of listings that infringe on third-party rights
Prohibition of use for money laundering purposes

personalInfoProtection.title: (1) Protection of Personal Information
items: Full compliance with Personal Information Protection Act
Acquisition of only minimum necessary information

informationHandling.title: (2) Information Handling
items: Obtaining consent when providing to third parties
Regular review and deletion of information

availability.title: (2) Ensuring Availability
items: Maintaining service uptime rate of 99.9% or higher

monitoringSystem.title: (3) Monitoring System
items: Recording and analysis of access logs

emergencyDefinition.title: (1) Definition of Emergency
emergencyDefinition.intro: The following events are defined as emergencies:
items: Business suspension due to natural disasters, etc.
Other events that threaten user safety

items.label: Detection and Reporting:
items.description: Immediately report to emergency response team upon discovery of emergency

items.label: Initial Response:
items.description: Prevention of damage expansion and ensuring user safety

items.label: Situation Confirmation:
items.description: Understanding of damage status and scope of impact

items.label: Recurrence Prevention:
items.description: Cause analysis and implementation of improvement measures

employeeEducation.title: (1) Employee Education
items: Regular safety management education for all employees (twice or more per year)

userAwareness.title: (2) User Awareness
items: Provision of safe transaction method guides
Enhancement of FAQ and support articles

section9.title: 9. Legal Compliance
section9.intro: The Company complies with the following laws and operates safely:
items: Act on Prevention of Transfer of Criminal Proceeds

regularReview.title: Regular Review
regularReview.description: To verify the effectiveness of the safety management system, internal audits are conducted regularly to identify areas for improvement.

riskAssessment.title: Risk Assessment
riskAssessment.description: New risks and threats are continuously assessed, and countermeasures are strengthened as necessary.

pdcaCycle.title: PDCA Cycle
pdcaCycle.description: Based on the cycle of Plan, Do, Check, Act, the safety management system is continuously improved.

section11.title: 11. Request to Customers
section11.intro: To use APPEXIT more safely, we ask for your cooperation on the following points:
items: Accurate description of listing content and transaction content
Checking ratings and reviews of transaction partners
Prohibition of direct transactions outside the platform
Prompt reporting of suspicious activities discovered

section12.title: 12. Contact
section12.intro: For inquiries regarding safety management or reporting suspicious activities, please contact:
